title: Machine Learning Sports Predictor
description: Constructed a machine learning model to predict La Liga League soccer match outcomes by collecting and preprocessing historical match data from the current season, achieving a prediction accuracy of 94% and a precision of 65%

title: Simon Says Game
description: Developed game system by utilizing Intel Quartus Prime software with VHDL to link circuits to button pad. Implemented game algorithms using VHDL to recognize button presses and pattern recognition .

title: Digital Signal Processing
description: Design of a digital filter to remove noise from audio files, utilizing IIR and FIR signal processing.

title: Python Battle Ship
description: This project was a Battle Ship Game that utilized python libaries.
